architectural_resources: Node.js web application / real-time chat server (Express + Socket.IO)
CI/CD: Jenkins pipeline (build, OWASP dependency check, Docker build/tag/push, trigger CD job)
CI/CD: AWS CodeBuild buildspec (implies CodeBuild project)
CI/CD: GitHub Actions workflows integrating with HCP Terraform/Terraform Cloud (organization/workspace, plan/apply runs)
Network: inbound TCP port 12345 exposed (Dockerfile EXPOSE 12345; docker-compose port mapping 12345:12345)
Artifact storage for built assets (CodeBuild artifacts base-directory 'public' in buildspec.yml)
